items.name: Lifepath
items.entry: 60 weeks worth of {@variantrule Downtime Activity|PHEW}, 30 or more of which happen {@variantrule level 0|PHEW|before gaining a level in a class}

entries.name: Free Spirit's Lifepath
entries: You don't have the time or the ability to commit to a single task for too long. To make up for that, your enthusiasm when you learn something new makes the first few weeks of training be particularly productive. The first week of {@variantrule Downtime Activity; Training|PHEW|training} on a new language or tool counts as 3 and the second counts as 2 for the purposes of progress towards learning the language or tool (the cost remains that of one week).

entries.name: Feature: Easygoing
entries: You have a knack for gaining people's favor or trust. Wherever you go, you can easily find a place where you receive free lodging and food of a modest or comfortable standard (depending on the quality of the establishment), perhaps in change for a small favor.

entries.name: Alt: Feature: Fearsome Reputation
entries: People recognize you as a member of the criminal underground, and they're careful not to draw your anger or ridicule. You can get away with minor criminal offenses, such as refusing to pay for food at a restaurant or breaking down a door at a local shop, if no legal authorities witness the crime. Most people are too daunted by you to report your wrongdoing to the authorities.

items.name: Lifepath
items.entry: 60 weeks worth of {@variantrule Downtime Activity|PHEW}, 30 or more of which happen {@variantrule level 0|PHEW|before gaining a level in a class}

entries.name: Roamer's Lifepath
entries: You learned to live off the land and even find comforts in it. You can maintain a comfortable lifestyle while {@variantrule Downtime Activity; Work|PHEW|working} at no cost.

You sheer amounts of interaction with nature go far beyond the average person's. You can {@variantrule Downtime Activity; Training|PHEW|train} the skills {@skill Animal Handling} and {@skill Medicine} as if they were a tool, at no cost per week.

entries.name: Feature: Wanderer
entries: You have an excellent memory for maps and geography, and you can always recall the general layout of terrain, settlements, and other features around you. In addition, you can find food and fresh water for yourself and up to five other people each day, provided that the land offers berries, small game, water, and so forth.

items.name: Lifepath
items.entry: 60 weeks worth of {@variantrule Downtime Activity|PHEW}, 10 or more of which happen {@variantrule level 0|PHEW|before gaining a level in a class}

entries.name: Student's Lifepath
entries: The first thing any student must learn is how to learn. Your {@variantrule Downtime Activity; Training|PHEW|training} to learn a language costs you no money. In addition, whenever you attempt to do some {@variantrule Downtime Activity; Research|PHEW|research}, it costs no money to attempt to do so, and you gain a +1 bonus for every 100 gp spent instead of for every 100 gp spent after the first 100 gp.

entries.name: Feature: Researcher
entries: When you attempt to learn or recall a piece of lore, if you do not know that information, you often know where and from whom you can obtain it. Usually, this information comes from a library, scriptorium, university, or a sage or other learned person or creature, Your DM might rule that the knowledge you seek is secreted away in an almost inaccessible place, or that it simply cannot be found. Unearthing the deepest secrets of the multiverse can require an adventure or even a whole campaign.

items.name: Lifepath
items.entry: 60 weeks worth of {@variantrule Downtime Activity|PHEW}, 30 or more of which happen {@variantrule level 0|PHEW|before gaining a level in a class}

entries.name: Worker's Lifepath
entries: Workers help each other, and for you to become profitable for your employer, training is part of the job. {@variantrule Downtime Activity; Training|PHEW|Training} to become proficient with {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phew|type=artisan's tools}, land vehicles, water vehicles, {@item navigator's tools|PHEW}, and {@item herbalism kit|PHEW}, only costs 5gp per workweek for you.

You need to learn the job while you're doing it, you need to learn new skill to prosper, and you need to enjoy your free time with music and games without losing any efficiency in your work. For every 2 week period you spend working, you gain the benefits of {@variantrule Downtime Activity; Training|PHEW|training} for 1 week at the same time.

entries.name: Feature: Favor with the Sphere
entries: You have knowledge of the work environment of the jobs you've done and the places and organizations you've worked for. Any job you've done for at least 10 weeks give you advantage on social checks made to gain favor with someone who works in that same place or field of work.
